scripts.build: npx tsc && cp -ap node_modules dist/ && zip dist/failoverAAindex.zip dist/* && zip dist/callHealthCheck.zip dist/node_modules dist/callHealthCheck.js && zip alicloud-aa-egress-failover main.tf vars.tf versions.tf dist/* ConfigScripts/*
scripts.setup-callhealthcheck: npx tsc && cp  -ap node_modules dist/ && cd dist && zip callHealthCheck.zip node_modules/* callHealthCheck.js AliCloudModels.js
scripts.setup-failoverindex: npx tsc && cp  -ap node_modules dist/ && cd dist && zip failoverAAindex.zip node_modules/* index.js AliCloudModels.js
scripts.setup: npm run setup-callhealthcheck && npm run setup-failoverindex
